mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY prod_seq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (prod_seq, prod_code, prod_title, prod_price, prod_price_sale, prod_amount, prod_comment, prod_point, prod_title_image) VALUES (nextval('prod_seq'), #{prod_code}, #{prod_title}, #{prod_price}, #{prod_price_sale}, #{prod_amount}, #{prod_comment}, #{prod_point}, #{prod_title_image})
